text: Geli ewane ku we bawer kiriye! Hun ji wan tisten, heke arsa wan ji bona we ra be vekirine, hune bi wan sik bibin, pirsa wan (ji pexember) nekin. U heke hun ji wan tistan didane hinartina Qurâ€™ane da (ji pexember) pirs bikin, ewan tiste ji bona we ra bene vekirine. Yezdan (evan) ji bona we ra baxisandine. Bi rasti Yezdan baxiskare mulahim e
